typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> AzureBlobStorageSecFilings
RenamedColumns foldDown(mapColumn(
		{_corrupt_record}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
AzureBlobStorageSecFilings select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenamedColumns
